title: Colombia Mulls Price Controls as Wage Hike Rattles Markets
description: Colombia’s government is considering price controls following a sharp increase in the minimum wage as it seeks to curb inflationary pressures that have rattled investors.
content: Colombia’s government is considering price controls following a sharp increase in the minimum wage as it seeks to curb inflationary pressures that have rattled investors.
